name: HOME SWEET HOME (itch) (tenifayiga)
description:
In a world where machines have become the backbone of human society, an unscrupulous service provider has taken over the appliances in everyone's homes! Society is faced with an ultimatum - bend to DOMAIN'S authority, or be denied access to their homes and appliances.

In this dark hour, one annoyed programmer has chosen a third option - hack his way through his own appliances and take back the house! Control is digital avatar as you chip away at the security systems protecting DOMAIN'S servers. Battle the five bosses standing between you and freedom! Do you have what it takes to defeat DOMAIN - or is the house destined to always win?

HOME SWEET HOME was created for the TechnoCulture class at UTD

Note: Mac build will be uploaded later tonight!
